summary: In a troubled African village, an unusual baby is born.
cast: Doudou Gueye Thiaw|Maimouna N'Diaye|Awa Sene Sarr|Robert Liensol|William Nadylam|Sebastien Hebrant|Thilombo Lubambu|Marie Augustine Diatta|Moustapha Diop|Isseu Niang|Selly Raby Kane|Erick Patrick Correa|Adjoua Barry|Charles Edouard Gomis Correa|Marie-Louise Shedeye Diiddi|Abdoulaye Diop|Josephine Theodora M'Boup|Tabata Ndiaye|Samba Wane|Aminatha N'Diaye|François Chicaïa|N'Deyé Aïta N'Diaye|Abdou El Aziz Gueye|Boury Kandé|Assy Dieng Ba|Antoinette Kellermann|Fezile Mpela|Theo Sebeko|Mabutho 'Kid' Sithole
title: Kirikú y la bruja
